sn22.12:1.4: “rupam, bhikkhave, aniccam, vedana anicca, sanna anicca, sankhara anicca, vinnanam aniccam.
sn22.12:1.5: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako rupasmimpi nibbindati, vedanayapi nibbindati, sannayapi nibbindati, sankharesupi nibbindati, vinnanasmimpi nibbindati.
sn22.12:1.6: Nibbindam virajjati; viraga vimuccati. Vimuttasmim vimuttamiti nanam hoti.
sn22.12:1.7: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati”ti.
